title: Programming For GIS
description: This course teaches fundamental programming skills for geoprocessing and data presentation in a geographic information system environment. The primary languages used are Python and Javascript.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: CP 4510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CP 6514 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
